datafield.subfield: Formation of (3)He in the reactions of stopped pion absorption

The results of the measurements of spectra and yields of helium isotope (3)He formed in the stopped pion absorption by nuclei are presented. The contributions of different mechanisms of the helium formation in these reactions on medium and heavy nuclei were determined. The proposed phenomenological model reproduces the (3)He spectra at energies >30 MeV satisfactorily.
